website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Track - Bucolo received a positive reception from consumers for the lightweight comfort and style that it delivered during workouts and walks. Other highlights included its true-to-size measurement and a supportive platform. It was not without its faults, however. The naysayers ranted about its inconsistent fit, durability issues, and undesirable insole build. In conclusion, it was considered a good-performing footgear that stood up to the rigors of regular training and walks.
pros: Most users complimented the comfortable construction of the Skechers Track - Bucolo
Many testers liked that it fit as expected
The shoe was praised by plenty of wearers for its stylish design
It had a lightweight nature, according to a handful of reviewers
Physically active people enjoyed using this model for walks and workouts
A few buyers appreciated the supportive platform of this workout shoe
Some purchasers said that the footgear was of good value for its price
A small number of individuals believed that the footwear was durable
cons: A majority of the critics griped about its inconsistent fit
some of them thought that the shoe ran smaller than usual while the others found it too big
Various detractors lamented the quality issues of the trainer with reports of torn mesh, decompressed insole, and worn-out sole after several months of use
A multitude of complaints surfaced about the Memory Foam insole, including the insufficient support and the heel pain it caused

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. When I first bought them, I found the ankle dug in a bit, which wasn't the end of the world, but wasn't a great start. But after owning these for a total of 9 days, the insoles are already ruined. I'm fairly active and bought these for my morning walks, but they've barely lasted more than a week, and I haven't even gone every single day. Spend the money on something that you'll actually get some good use out of.
customer_reviews.author: Shooting Star

customer_reviews.title: Good, but..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an 18 month old pair of skechers equaliser trainers. Hoped they would be similar but nowhere near as comfortable for walking in. The bottom of the outer tongue, below the laces, is a harder material than the area around it, this rubs on the top of the foot/toes while walking. OK for shorter distance and well made. The cushioned sole is very good.
customer_reviews.author: TulEng

customer_reviews.title: Working ok so far
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from plantar fasciitis and was recommended to try these, after wearing them for a couple of days the pain in my feet was slightly relieved, but I ended up with a blister on my ankle, I did wear them for 2full days instead of breaking them in so guess it’s my own fault. I will wear them again once the blister has healed up (maybe a few less hours) if the pain continues to be relieved then I’d say they’re gonna be a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hall

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As i know longer run due to osteo-arthritis, i wanted a pair of trainers that i can wear for all occasions incl walking and going to the gym/work. I have worn sketcher golf shoes and also rate those highly. These trainers are lightweight and very comfy. Wore them this weekend for a camping trip and they took no breaking in. All my shoes are a size 10 so i got these in a 10 and they fit fine. I have since been and ordered another pair as not sure for long long i would be able to get these shoes for less than £40. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big sketchers fan, they always fit my feet perfectly though I do get a size larger, my feet are size 8 - 81/2 but sketchers size 9 are a ver comfortable fit. These particular sketches are amazingly comfortable, I haven’t had them long so cannot comment on durability but I have high expectations as previous sketchers I have had have proven to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Not foot shaped.
customer_reviews.text: I could see there was something wrong as soon as i took them out of the box. They looked like shoes of a larger size at first but i realised that is because they are stupidly narrow. I would estimate that the shoes i was sent are at least one size smaller then the lable. I feel like i have had my time wasted to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort, nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My father in law, loves his new trainers! He says, he should have bought a pair, ages ago!.. I convinced him, to get a pair similar to mine. He loves, the comfort as he has, bad joints (Arthritis) He says, he would recomend them, to anyone 👍😎
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rd Kirkby

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Like wearing slipper. I’ve worn these to work everyday for almost a year and they are still as comfortable as the day I got them. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Issue with the insoles
customer_reviews.text: These are good, trainers, but after wearing them for only 3 days the insoles became unglued and they started moving around. I have now got a replacement pair, so I will update this post when I start wearing(weather Permitting) wearing them again.
customer_reviews.author: N0 1 Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I buy them regularly as I wear them out!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expect from a pair of skechers, wide enough to take account of my bunion, the memory foam helps the fact I tend to “stomp” which can be punishing on my feet. I buy a new pair every 4-6 months but I’m particularly hard on shoes. However, it is not even shower proof - that is how they are designed, totally breathable, and therefore will let water straight through. I know what to expect and I still wear them all year around
customer_reviews.author: DrTaffy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light. Great trainers for walking.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable as you would expect from Skechers. Very light too and also seem to allow feet to breathe ok. I got them for walking and have only had a few days so not sure how long they will last. Based on other Skechers I've had will last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: smilingman

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight, used them last week for walking in Cornwall. Highly recommend anything Skechers make, so comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: Size was just about right (UK size 9) and very comfortable. Have worn them all this week so far for several hours at a time and very happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a friend who is loving them and wanted to buy in navy blue but were not available in the colour.

customer_reviews.text: I've had these a month and the sole is already coming away. All I've done is walk in them, no running or anything to warrant such wear and tear. Royally pissed off as I expected more from a big brand.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely rubbish. The soles both fell off.

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable to start off with but now only 4 months down the line with moderate use the foam has lost its bounce back, the sole of the shoes are starting to wear as they are only a type of foam and the fabric inside is beginning to wear and break inside. cannot see how these are branded as sports/ workout trainers as they do not last 5 mins, not impressed do not buy unless you like going through multiple pairs of shoes in a year and as for the price certainly not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: These are not really the relaxed fit as advertised, ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not really the relaxed fit as advertised, which is disappointing as they cam from the USA! Expensive to return!

customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a present so cant really tell you how they fitted etc. But postage was brilliant.
